titleStmt.title: A replication to a late book written by Mr. Benjamin Keach against infants-baptism intituled A counter-antidote, &c. By Gyles Shute of Lime-house.
titleStmt.author: Shute, Giles, b. 1650 or 51.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author: published and sold by Randal Taylor near Stationers-Hall, and Nath. Hiller in Leaden-hall-street,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Keach, Benjamin. A counter-antidote to purge out the malignant effects of a late counterfeit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
